goal: Establish an immediate secure perimeter around the main living area to protect family, livestock, and equipment. Expandable in later phases.

steps.title: Mark Immediate Security Zone
steps.description: Define a 1-hectare area around the living and storage area for initial fencing. Use stakes and string to outline perimeter.

steps.title: Install Fence Posts
steps.description: Dig holes 60cm deep at 3â€“4m intervals. Insert Y-posts and set in concrete. Ensure posts are level and vertically aligned.

steps.title: Attach Diamond Mesh Fencing
steps.description: Unroll mesh along posts. Use tensioners and clips to secure tightly. Ensure mesh is flush with the ground to prevent animal entry.

steps.title: Install Barbed Wire
steps.description: Attach 2 strands along the top of posts using staples. Keep barbs away from walkways and livestock feed areas.

steps.title: Install Gate
steps.description: Set gate posts in concrete. Hang gate, ensuring swing is free and latch works properly. Check for smooth operation.

steps.title: Set Up Solar Security Lights
steps.description: Mount 4 lights around perimeter, especially near gates and storage areas. Test sensors and light coverage at night.

steps.title: Inspect and Adjust
steps.description: Walk perimeter checking for gaps, sagging mesh, loose posts, or areas where animals can enter. Reinforce weak points.

safety: Wear gloves when handling barbed wire to prevent cuts.
Wear safety glasses when cutting fencing or using hammer/drill.
Concrete handling requires gloves and careful mixing to prevent skin irritation.
Keep children and pets away from work area during installation.
